content: ä¸‰ã€å…·ä½“å®ç° func getNext(pat string) []int { n := len(pat) next := make([]int, n) for l, cur := 0, 1; cur < n; cur ++ { // ä¸æƒ³ç­‰éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®å‰é¢å¾—åˆ°çš„ nextï¼Œæ›´æ–° l // ç›´åˆ°ç›¸ç­‰æˆ–è€… l == 0 for l > 0 && pat[l] != pat[cur] {l = next[l-1]} if pat[cur] == pat[l] { l++ } next[cur] = l } return next } func KMP(s, pat string) int { n, m := len(s), len(pat) next := getNext(pat) i, j := 0, 0 for i < n && j < m { for j > 0 && pat[j] != s[i] {j = next[j-1]} if s[i] == pat[j] { j++ } i++ } if j == m { return i - m } else { return -1 } }
